video_prompt: Anime girl with pink hair and cat ears slowly turns her head, expression subtly shifting. Her long hair sways gently. The dress fabric subtly ripples as she shifts her weight. A tattoo on her arm gently shimmers. Accessory elements appear and disappear around her.
image_prompt: Anime character design sheet, full body female, light pink hair, cat ears, demure, blue eyes, white dress with dark blue lace-up corset back and bow, halter neckline, short skirt with subtle light blue floral hem, thigh-high stockings with dark blue bands, long flowing hair, braided side hair with light blue flower, blue floral/tribal tattoo on left arm. Includes accessory illustrations: stylized "Snreook" with blue flower, dark blue bow, stylized "Scieepnns Baeetpr", detailed blue flowers, and small back view of character. Plain white background.
refined_video_prompt: A head slowly turns, expression subtly shifting. Hair gently sways. Garment fabric subtly ripples with a weight shift. An arm marking gently shimmers. Surrounding elements spontaneously emerge and vanish.
